snippet: Analysts said the sale by Exor, which is run by a member of Fiat’s founding Agnelli family, could help prepare for Fiat’s eventual purchase of all of Chrysler.
lead_paragraph: Analysts said the sale by Exor, which is run by a member of Fiat’s founding Agnelli family, could help prepare for Fiat’s eventual purchase of all of Chrysler.

headline.seo: Exor, Fiat Owner, Sells Stake in SGS
headline.main: Fiat Owner Sells Stake in Swiss Firm
headline.print_headline: Fiat Owner Sells Stake in Swiss Firm
